caption: A person opens their eyes, and red alarms are flashing in front of them. They lift their clothes to reveal a wound. A man in armor enters the cabin. Inside the cabin, there are sparking electrical discharges. He picks up a weapon. There is a lake and many dead bodies here. The man looks up at the starry sky. In the cockpit, someone is speaking over a broadcast. A man is driving in the wilderness. Inside the cockpit, the man plays a video of a woman on a screen. It's very dark in the forest, and a man is walking through it.
